inn1.comm: gets this one to curve into Hughes, who tucks it towards square leg
short of length on the pads, it hits the thigh pad and rolls towards fine leg
another short of length delivery outside off, swings away from the batsman and it's left alone
another one of those in the channel outside off, swings away a touch and it's left alone
shortish deliver outside off, doesn't come on to the bat very well as Finch pushes it towards cover
it's short of length and wide outside off, the batsman goes for a cut, but misses. The ball passes the outside edge, but goes to Dhoni on the bounce
it's on the pads and it's easily clipped to fine leg for a single
he bowls this on a back of length on off stump, the batsman defends it back to the bowler
he stays on the back foot and punches this short of length delivery, but can't beat Yuvi at cover
another accurate delivery on off stump, defended back to the bowler
this one comes back in a touch, stays low as well, the batsman closes the bat face to defend that towards midwicket
another one on the stumps, the batsman pushes it towards wide mid-on for a quick single
now Bhuvi moves his line closer to the stumps, defended towards mid-on off the back foot
not coming on to the bat, Finch's attempted cut to this short and wide delivery is chopped to the keeper
this one comes in from outside off, the batsman defends awkwardly from the crease, he wasn't expecting the movement
oh, this one has cut the batsman in half, it flies over the middle stump. The bowler appeals belatedly for something, but there was nothing on that
he stands tall and punches the short of length delivery to extra cover
he completes a maiden with another one on the off stump, the batsman defends
he bowls length on off stump which Hughes chooses to defends from the back foot
he finds the gap at cover point with a well-timed push, just a nudge off a short of length delivery
he pushes it towards Ishant Sharma at mid-on and it's a single there on most days
he takes a little step forward and drives this one beautifully on the up, through extra cover for Australia's first boundary
this time he is not given any room, he defends it back to the bowler
another tight delivery on off, the batsman pushes it towards mid-off
he hits the pads with one that cuts sharply into the batsman, and appeal for lbw, but that was going down the leg side easily, even the impact was outside leg
he shuffles across in the crease and nudges the short of length delivery to square leg
comes forward and squeezes this length delivery down to left of third man for a single
he gets this one to come back again, and Finch is struggling to get bat on ball. It hit him below the knee roll, but heading down the leg side
he stands on his toes and tucks this angled delivery towards midwicket
short of length delivery, no pace on this pitch, the batsman can only tamely cut it to point
he comes forward to this length delivery and checks his shot late, pushes it towards mid-off
he bowls it short of length on off, the batsman defends it from the crease
he waits on the back foot now and nudges this one to midwicket
pushed a touch further, the batsman flicks it towards leg side, but again hit straight to the midwicket fielder
short of length, the batsman goes on the back foot and tucks it to midwicket again
this one is on the pads, it hits the thigh pad and rolls to the right of Dhoni and they take a single
he comes forward and pushes the length ball straight to cover
back of length on the middle and leg line, Hughes pushes it towards mid-on for a quick single
finally he breaks the shackles with his favourite shot, a golf swing, that sails over mid-on and clears the rope, only just. Bhuvi though experimented with a fuller length
now he finds the gap at cover with a beautifully timed punch off a perfectly of short of length delivery
he is struggling to put bat into the ones that are coming into him, this time he gets hit on the pads again, but this was heading down leg
shortish delivery outside off, Bhuvi's economy takes a beating as Finch short-arm-jabs it through midwicket, all along the ground
back of length delivery on the stumps, the batsman defends it to midwicket
fuller length delivery on off, the batsman comes forward and drives, without much timing, straight to cover
there is no doubt about this one, he comes forward to this widish delivery and cracks it through cover point with flourishing drive
he bowls on the stumps now, the batsman defends it back to the bowler
some extra bounce from good length, Hughes defends it back to the bowler, but takes his bottom hand of the handle as he does that
short of length on the stumps, this time the batsman chooses to pull this one, and does it well as he swivels on his one leg and finds the boundary at deep square leg
the batsman pushes it towards wide mid-on with soft hands and thinks about a couple, but Jadeja from long-on charges in and keeps them to one
oh beautifully hit! This was on off stump and Hughes just stands tall and punches it through cover on the up, no one moves
shuffles across and defends the back of length delivery back to the bowler
fuller length delivery on off stumps, it's pushed firmly to mid-on off the front foot
he walks down the pitch, but checks his shot as the length is short, pushes it softly towards mid-off for a single
slightly slower from Bhuvi, 113 kph, the batsman defends it back to the bowler
poor start by the bowler as he bowls it short from round the stumps, Hughes allows the ball to come into him and pulls it along to deep backward square leg for a boundary

another back of length delivery, this time Hughes nudges it towards midwicket and says NO immediately. But Finch had run down a few paces and looked in trouble briefly as Yuvraj takes down the stumps with a direct hit. Not so, as Finch had made it through comfortably
he tucks this short of length delivery past Yuvraj at square leg for a couple of runs
he again tucks this angled delivery to backward square leg, where Yuvraj is stationed
clips this short of length delivery to fine leg with ease
he stands tall and cuts the short of length delivery, but hits it straight to cover point
tossed up delivery on off, the batsman comes forward and pushes it to cover
he comes down the pitch and defends the flighted delivery towards off
slightly shorter in length, allows the batsman to go back and punch it to deep cover
pushed through, but this is on the pads and Finch goes on the back foot to nudge it to deep square leg
shimmies down the pitch, and pushes the length delivery to midwicket
it's slightly short and bounces a touch extra, Hughes cuts it in the air, over the infield, but well short of deep point

a straightforward chance at point has been dropped by Virat! It was outside off and the batsman just plays a loose drive that heads straight to Virat, who is not able to hold on to this. Ishant immediately turns away and walks back to his mark
back of length delivery, it's defended to mid-on
now Finch gets a short and wide gift outside off and he accepts it duly, hammering it with a powerful cut through point
another short and wide delivery, this one is not hit very hard, but he make sure he places it to the left of the point fielder, and it has enough legs to beat the third man fielder
he bowls this one fuller and on off stump, the batsman comes forward to defend, but inside edges it on to his pads
another length delivery on off, the batsman pushes it to the left of cover fielder for an easy single
he is getting a proper move on now. It was tossed up outside off and the batsman take full toll of it, smashing it over deep midwicket with a powerful slog
pushed through on off, flat and short, the batsman punches it back to the bowler
again quicker through the air and heading down leg side, the batsman attempts a sweep, but gets hit on the pads
now short and wide filth outside off, it was quick as well, and all Finch has to do is run it past point, Ishant at deep point has no chance
he makes room and tries to force the quicker delivery through off, but is beaten by the bounce
length delivery on off, Hughes goes after this one, he attempts to loft it over cover, but it flies behind point and drops just short of the charging fielder at third man
short of length outside off, the batsman waits and punches it to deep cover for an easy single
back of length delivery on the stumps, defended back to the bowler
length delivery, but the batsman decides to go towards leg side, chips it over midwicket with a wristy flick, lot of bottom hand in that one
back of length delivery on off, cramps the batsman for room as he defends it towards midwicket

length delivery outside off, and Hughes plays that wonderful on the up drive through cover, lots of timing on that again and Ashwin has to run around quickly to keep the ball from reaching the boundary
pushed through on the middle and leg line, the batsman defends it towards midwicket
he comes forward to defend and gets an inside edge on to the pads
he creates room and hammers it over cover with a powerful aerial drive
now he smartly pushes it to long-off for a single
flatter delivery on off, the batsman punches it past the non-striker for a single
he comes forward and defends the delivery to cover
full delivery outside off, the batsman crunches a drive through extra cover, but there is protection in the deep
short and wide, all the batsman has do is the beat the fielder at point and that he does with ease. That was slapped hard
better delivery, this is around off stump, the batsman drops it towards cover for a quick single
length delivery on off, the batsman dabs it towards mid-on for a quick single and he has to rush to the other end as the fielder was on it quickly. But no direct hit, no problems
he tries to punch this on the up through off, but gets an inside edge to the leg side
stop the press, Ishant has beaten the bat! He gets one to straighten outside off and it just flies past Finch's bat as he looks to drive it on the up
flatter and shorter on the stumps, the batsman goes back and whips it behind square for a single
slower this time and on the stumps, the batsman defends it back to the bowler
not short enough to cut, and Finch is beaten as it turns a touch too
tries to drive it firmly through off, but it's hit straight to cover
comes forward and pushes it softly towards long on for a single
fuller and on the stumps, Hughes walks across and flicks it to deep square leg, between the two fielders in the deep, for a couple
bowls a gently 102 kph leg cutter outside off and Finch just runs it down past the diving man - Ashwin - at short third man, fifty for him. Well played
stays in the crease and punches it down to long on for a single
he bowls a yorker from round the stumps, the batsman is surprised, but digs it out in the end
keeps it tight on the stumps, but it's pushed down to long on for a single
poor delivery, it's loopy half-volley wide outside off, Finch uses his muscle to carve it inside out over extra cover with a beautiful hit
he shortens the length and the batsman punches it to cover off the back foot
Hughes able to steer this length ball through fine leg for a couple

Would you believe it! Dhoni has a leg slip positioned just behind and Hughes obliges by taking a back of a length delivery which spins into him, and he eases it behind, but straight into the clutches of Raina. My feeling is that he did not see him there in the first place, and mixed with the amount of turn, ends up leading to his downfall
Defended off the back foot
pitched up outside off and Watson drills this to extra-cover
pitched up on a fuller length and Finch pushes this through to mid off
on the same length and Watson reaches out to work this through to long off
How prophetic am I? He has taken out the Big Kahuna, with Watson lofting a fuller delivery on and around off straight into the waiting hands of Jadeja at long on
;ow full toss outside off stump, Bailey drives it down to long off
Yuvraj drags this one and Finch is unlucky to smack this straight to short extra-cover
not much of air on this flatter delivery on the stumps, Finch stays back and blocks well
gets on the back foot to clip this just behind square on the leg side, but finds the fielder. Bailey wanted the single though
cuts this straight to point, and once again unable to get off strike
Bailey gets forward to defend a length ball on middle and off

this one a bit shorter and Bailey able to free his arms to cut in the gap between point and cover for a boundary. Deafening silence from the ground, although they may have just keeled over from the heat
flighted delivery outside off stump, Bailey defends off the front foot
lovely live here from Jadeja as Bailey successfully keeps this out
Bailey tries to work this away through the off side, but finds the fielder
fuller length and defended to the off side
Yuvraj drags this one again and Finch seems to have all day to power this in the gap on the leg side, but instead finds deep midwicket
pitches this up a bit more and Bailey goes for the pull, but doesn't get good bat on it
this one pitched fuller outside off and Bailey directs this straight at short extra-cover
fuller length delivery that Bailey eases down to long off
flighted wide of off stump and Finch able to steer this away on the off side
short ball and Bailey backs away to cut this square of the wicket
pitched up and Bailey drills this to long off with ease
this time throws in the straight one which Finch tries to cut away, but is not given the requisite space as he almost chops it on
a little wider this time and Finch tries to cut this away
Finch able to take this length ball and work it away through extra-cover
fuller length just outside off that Bailey defends on the front foot
length ball and Bailey fetches this from outside off to steer through to sweeper cover
Yuvraj pitches this up and Bailey seems to have premeditated this as he goes for the sweep behind square that beats the fielder to the boundary
Bailey then does the sensible thing of taking a single off the next ball
short of a length and Bailey gets on the back foot to work this away to long off
pitched up just outside off as Bailey defends towards point
short and wide and Bailey employs the cut to find sweeper cover

Yuvraj lucky to get away with just a single as he drags this on a middle and off line which Finch steers towards long off. Finch is playing the long-haul innings here and trying to make his start count for something substantial
big shout for LBW, not given. Flighted delivery on the off stump, Finch leans forward to defend, misses and is hit on the pad in line with the off stump
Finch works this next one away to short midwicket
works this away to backward square leg
pitched up and Bailey tries to beat Jadeja to the left of him, but Jadeja quick enough to recover it and prevent the run
cut away by Bailey towards point for one
a little slower through the air and just outside off stump, Finch finds the man at extra-cover again
speared in on middle and off which Finch works away towards extra-cover
length ball and Bailey rocks back to nudge this through to mid on
back of a length and Finch works this away to cover point
fuller length and Bailey opens the face to it, but is unlucky to find short third man
length ball and Bailey drills this straight to mid on
Bailey goes for the cut and Kohli anticipates well as he runs to his right to dive and stop the ball. Excellent effort there from the vice-captain

flighted delivery outside off and Yuvraj is having a whale of a time as he gets Finch to go for the lofted shot, but ends up mishitting this straight up in the air, which carries to Virat Kohli, one of India's best fielders, who is waiting at long off. Big wicket for India as Finch was threatening to play a big innings
flighted delivery again outside off which Bailey finds the man at short extra-cover
Bailey able to complete two as he hits this towards backward point, who pounces on it, but ends up misfielding which allows for the second run
flighted on middle and Bailey waits on it before clipping through to long on
tossed up outside off stump, Voges waits and drives it to long off to get off the mark straightaway
flighted on middle and defended back to the bowler. Good over from Yuvraj and India getting closer to controlling this match. Need another wicket to start to turn the tables
Voges steps forward to a fuller length delivery, and ends up defending back to him
this one spins viciously on and around off, and is worked back to Jadeja
flatter and outside off stump, Voges cuts it straight to point
fires this in on middle which Voges gets forward to defend to
Voges finally gets away as he clips this through to mid on
Bailey advances down to work this away through midwicket, and the pair run intelligently enough to scamper back for the second, which they complete with ease as the incoming throw is a bit late
shortish delivery from Yuvraj and Voges cuts this away through point, with Dhawan diving to stop a couple of runs, but the batsmen still complete a single
fuller this time and Bailey unlucky to find mid off
this one pitches on middle which Bailey gets down on one knee to sweep behind powerfully, beating Ishant to the fine leg boundary
fuller length and Bailey tries to cut this away through third man, but almost gets him in trouble as it looks like he may chop on to the stumps
Bailey has targeted midwicket as this short ball is swatted in that region to the boundary
pitched right up in the blockhole and Bailey eases this through to long on
Bailey is at him straight away with a sweep square of the wicket
length ball which Voges defends to the right of Ashwin
lovely paddle sweep from Voges down to fine leg
short ball and Bailey gets back to sweep this straight to square leg
back of a length on middle and leg which Voges fails to work away
short again from Ashwin and Voges able to steer this to midwicket for a single, and retain the strike
Voges greets him with a shot through to midwicket for one
back of a length outside off and Bailey unable to get it away through the off side
short again and Voges just angles the bat to steer this through to third man
full and on leg stump as Bailey clips this with ease through to deep midwicket

back of a length outside off and the Aussies take on Yuvraj's fielding, as he swoops in towards point and fires in a throw at the striker's end which Voges, who dives in vain, is unable to get to. However, once he gets past the crease, he curls into the fetus position, as he seems to be in some pain. But as I glance over he is walking back to the dressing room as the third umpire confirms it is out. A huge cheer rings from the Pune crowd
length ball which Bailey works away to sweeper cover to get off the mark
Maxwell defends on the front foot
Maxwell once again sees this one off
tossed up on the stumps, Maxwell defends well from the crease
Maxwell finally able to steer this through to backward point
back of a length on leg stump as Maxwell glances this for a quick single
short of length delivery outside off stump, Bailey opens the face of the bat and steers it to third man
short ball and Maxwell was waiting on it as he is able to take it on with a fierce pull in the gap through midwicket
back of a length which Maxwell gets on top off. Bailey wants the run but is sent back
slower length ball outside off and Maxwell opens the face to steer through to third man
length ball again outside off and Bailey hangs his bat to get this through the same region
pitched up and this one is the straighter one as Bailey plays for the turn, with the ball just beating the outside edge
quicker and on the leg stump, Bailey sweeps it straight to fine leg
pitched up just outside off and Bailey able to work it away to the leg side
Maxwell plays this one inside out in hopes of finding space on the off side
Maxwell plays a bunted shot square of the wicket on the leg side for one
short from Ashwin and Bailey gets back to ease this through to long on
fuller length on and around off and Bailey straight drives this down the ground for one
full again and Maxwell tries to find the gap on the off side
short ball this time as Maxwell plays this under his eyes through the extra-cover region
back of a length again which Bailey chooses to keep this out
little fuller, but still short of a length as Bailey opens the face to steer this through the third man region
short again and Maxwell advances down the track in hopes of bludgeoning through the off side, but finds cover
pitches this up and Bailey does a fine job getting two runs as he clips this through the midwicket region to bring up a well-played 50
full from Ashwin which Bailey works away to mid on

Ashwin what are you doing? As he is about to release he holds in anticipation of what Maxwell will be doing, but it really doesnt matter as he offers a juicy full toss going down the leg side which Maxwell hammers over square leg for six
fuller this time and Maxwell steers this through to long off
goes for the square drive but Kohli, at cover, has other thoughts
this time opens the face as Rohit comes into the fray, but is unable to prevent the single
he gets a shortish delivery on off, which he drags down to deep square leg with an agricultural pull
he dabs it towards midwicket and calls for a quick single
oh beautifully picked up! This was a low full-toss on the middle stump, and it was a slow too, Maxwell smacks it well, gets down on his knee and launches it over square leg
now a loose shot outside off as he misses the slower delivery
he is making the most of the powerplay, it's a fuller length delivery outside off  and he picks it up over cover with the cleanest of the swings, clears the ropes easily
he has thrown it away, he tries to play a similar shot to what he played off the last delivery, but the length was slightly short, and he ends up toe-ending it straight to cover
he goes back and chops it towards point
flatter and quicker on middle stump, punched back to the bowler
shortish and on leg stump, the batsman gets down on his knee to sweep it, but misses
he goes on the back foot and works it away to deep square leg
slightly slower this time, Haddin comes forward and defends
goes on the back foot and punches the flatter delivery to midwicket
he stays on the back foot and dabs it towards mid-off for a quick single
length delivery on off, the batsman stays in the crease and defends it to mid-on
short and wide, and that has been slapped past a flying Yuvraj at point
and he makes it two boundaries in a row with a beautifully timed drive through extra cover
stays in the crease and defends the length delivery back to the bowler
short of length delivery wide outside off, Haddin aims his pull to the leg side, but misses it completely
he stays back and clips it towards deep square leg for a single
bowls the carrom ball which is defended back to the bowler
he goes back and now pushes it back to the right of the bowler
slightly tossed up and on the middle and leg line, Haddin goes for an aerial sweep, but is not able to beat the fielder in the deep
he waits on the back foot and taps it to short third man for a single
on the back foot again and chops it on towards backward point
quicker delivery on off, the batsman goes back and punches it to cover point
that was actually too close to cut, the batsman is lucky not to chop that on, plays it towards short third man
again, close to the stumps, this time the batsman chooses to play with a straighter bat, punches it to deep cover
he comes forward and defends it back to the bowler
tossed up delivery, it's pushed to deep cover for a single
he dabs it to the gap at cover for another easy single
he stays on the back foot and punches it to long on for a single

this one is plumb, Haddin was deep in his crease and tried to flick this flatter delivery towards the leg side, but it was pushed a bit quicker too and Haddin was beaten to be hit right in front of the middle stump. That would have gone on to hit the top of the middle
he gets off the mark first ball with a soft push towards cover point
he comes forward and defends it back to the bowler
tossed up delivery outside off and the batsman drags it to deep midwicket with a sweep
short and flat outside off, the batsman just nudges it through cover for a single, while a better batsman could have punished that one properly
it's short of length outside off, the batsman punches it to deep cover for a single
short delivery outside off, it doesn't get up much, but Bailey plays a neat pull past midwicket, all along the ground and there is a huge gap there for him to exploit
but the batsman plays a similar delivery smartly, pulls it finer on the leg side, between short fine leg and backward square leg
length delivery outside off, the batsman steers it straight to backward point
slower delivery outside off, the batsman waits and forces it to deep cover with ease
short of length delivery on the stumps, the batsman defends it to point
flatter delivery on the off stump line, the batsman stays in the crease and whips it to deep square leg for a single
slower this time, and on the off stump line, the batsman defends it off the front foot
even slower this time, Faulkner waits and then defends it to the leg side
shorter and quicker, but on the leg stump line, Faulkner shuffles across and clips it to deep square leg
attempts a carrom ball, but this a wrong line, way down the leg side and it's helped to the fine leg boundary with a powerful sweep
he comes forward and pushes it to long on
short of length delivery wide outside off, but Bailey forces it to deep midwicket with his pull shot
length delivery on off, the batsman checks his shot at the end, plays it to cover off the front foot
he waits and steers the length delivery to backward point for a single

length delivery on off, the batsman dabs it towards mid-on and takes the first easily, but then he thinks about a second. Vinay, in the meantime, had run to the ball and fires a throw at the non-striker's. Had that hit, it was curtains for Bailey, but he survives
he stays in the crease and clips the back of length delivery to deep backward square leg

smart pull shot again! It was short of length outside off, instead of pulling it along the ground like he was doing earlier, Bailey chooses to go straighter and in the air, he finds the gap at wide long-on and it just drops short of the boundary
he waits in the crease and dabs the length delivery to square leg for a single
he makes room my moving outside leg and thuds this through extra cover, once it beats the man at extra cover, it picks up speed

and he holes out at deep midwicket! The shot was on though, it was a tossed up delivery on off and Bailey aimed for the stands at deep midwicket, he just doesn't get as much as he would have liked behind that and the fielder takes a simple catch right on the edge of the boundary
he bowls that carrom ball but the line is on leg stump, the batsman defends it to the leg side
now he comes forward and pushes it straight to cover
tossed up and full on off, the batsman pushes it to wide mid-on for an easy single, but Ashwin was not watching the throw from the fielder and allows an overthrow
angled in to the batsman, who tucks it to midwicket for a single

length delivery on off, the batsman gives it mighty swing and it goes way up in the air towards deep midwicket, between the two worst fielders - Ishant and Ashwin - and it lands safely between them. It should have been Ishant's
another length ball, but this time Faulkner gets it in the meat, it's flat and it flies through that gap between Ashwin and Ishant again
and again, even bigger now, Ishant and Ashwin can keep looking now, this one is in the stands
bowls a wide yorker now, the batsman can only dig it out towards long on for a single
length delivery on off stump, slightly slower as well, the batsman defends it back to the bowler
fuller length delivery on off, the batsman inside edge it on to his pads as he looks for a drive through off
he bowls a good yorker on off, which gets a thick outside edge and flies low to the right of Dhoni. It didn't carry, but Dhoni gets a hand to it
attempts a premeditated paddle, but Bhuvi bowls it wide outside off, the batsman misses
he misses his length by just a fraction, ends up bowling a half-volley and it's hammered down the ground, all along the turf
and he errs the other way now, it's a low full toss on off and the batsman muscles it to the gap at deep midwicket
another length ball and it was in Johnson's arc, somehow it misses the bat, and also the off stump
bowls a full and wide delivery outside off and he is lucky not to give away four, the batsman gets a toe-end in his drive and Jadeja covers it up at deep extra cover

Ishant gives a stare to the batsman! It was another wide and full delivery, and unlike the previous delivery, Faulkner gets a whole lot of bat in this one, times this one perfectly, but just hits it at catchable hight at Vinay Kumar at extra cover. The fielder times his jump and plucks it
he drives the length delivery slightly in the air, straight to point
back of length delivery outside off, McKay likes it, he flat-bats it to wide long-on boundary with utmost ease. The mid-on was in, and he is being sent back now
slower delivery on a length, asking to be hit, McKay swings and gets it right of the meat, sends it soaring in the Pune sky to the stands at deep midwicket
he gets a low full toss that's driven to long-on for a single

inn2.comm: 147 kph, short on middle stump which Dhawan, rather hurriedly, tucks away to the leg side
151 kph, short again and Dhawan able to cross-bat square of the wicket on the leg side to get off the mark
145 kph, full on and around off and Rohit off the mark with a drive through cover
153 kph, short ball which rises appreciably. Dhawan does the smart thing and weaves away
153 kph, length ball on middle and leg which Dhawan defends to the left of Johnson
155 kph, short again just outside off as Dhawan weaves again to allow it through
125 kph, and starts off with a wide outside off..
127 kph, back of a length which is tucked away to the leg side for one
127 kph, full and Dhawan gets a thickish inside edge through to the fine leg region
127 kph, this one pitches on a length outside off which shapes away appreciably
126 kph, length ball just outside off which Rohit gets on the front foot to. McKay utters a stifled appeal, but there was nothing in it really
length ball again on the same line, looking to draw him forward, Rohit angles his bat to place this through point
130 kph, back of a length and Rohit works this away through mid on for a single to retain the strike
fuller length on and around off and Rohit goes for the drive, but the fielder at point is able to dive to stop it
144 kph, right in the blockhole as Rohit drives this down the ground, but once again is intercepted by mid off
146 kph, fuller length just outside off as Rohit tries to work it away
148 kph, back of a length which Rohit opens the face to towards point
147 kph, full again, wide of off stump, as Rohit shoulders arms
148 kph, back of a length which Rohit cuts away behind square for a single
130 kph, fuller length just outside off as Rohit hangs his bat, with the ball just beating the edge
128 kph, fuller length outside off as Rohit cuts this away behind square on the front foot, but third man is able to rein it in at the boundary
130 kph, full and just outside off, but shapes away upon pitching. Dhawan content to leave it alone
129 kph, back of a length outside off which Dhawan allows through once more
128 kph, right in the blockhole as Dhawan hits this right back at McKay, who deflects it to the off side with his hands
133 kph, back of a length as Dhawan is unable to work it away to the leg side, being cramped for space

144 kph, full and in the slot as Rohit goes for the expansive drive through cover, but Voges, stationed at cover, is able to get a hand to it to take some pace off the ball. Saved two runs there, Voges
149 kph, length ball on the pads as Rohit glances this uppishly through square, but finds backward square leg
153 kph, short ball on a leg stump line as Rohit ducks under it straightaway
133 kph, full and in the slot as Johnson slips in a slower ball (if you call 133 kph a slower ball) as Rohit opens the face to it
146 kph, full and Rohit will not miss twice as this is in the slow, with the square drive coming out in full display. The Australian fielders did not have a chance
149 kph, goes well wide of off stump as Johnson is a bit miffed by the call, but it definitely looked like a wide on second view
153 kph, back of a length that cramps Rohit for space as he struggles to work it away
130 kph, lovely length ball just outside off which Dhawan shoulders arms to
129 kph, fuller and in the slot, but Dhawan unable to beat mid off
130 kph, full again as Dhawan steers this to long off
128 kph, full again as Rohit gets a low outside edge which fails to carry to Haddin, with the ball continuing on to the third man boundary. Lucky break for Rohit there
128 kph, back of a length delivery which swings away from Rohit
128 kph, shortish delivery on the pads as Rohit whips this off the pads which almost carries to the fine leg boundary, but the fielder does well to stop it

133 kph, full and in the slot as Dhawan opens the face to steer behind point. Maxwell, swooping in, gets the ball and fires in a throw at the non-strikers, but the throw is wide off the stumps, and carries on to the midwicket boundary for four extra runs

134 kph, pitched up and leaves Dhawan, who gets an edge on through to keeper. Faulkner, who is so pumped, goes for the high-five with Haddin, but hits him accidentally in the eye. Needless, as was that throw from Maxwell. But oh, well, Australia have picked up the first scalp.
135 kph, length ball just outside off which Kohli allows through to the keeper
135 kph, back of a length which Kohli inside-edges on to the pads
131 kph, crunching cover drive from Kohli, but hits it straight at short extra-cover
136 kph, shortish from Faulkner as Kohli opens the face to steer this behind point for a couple to get off the mark
128 kph, back of a length which Rohit allows through
128 kph, this one is brought in closer as Rohit drops the gloves
126 kph, length ball outside off which Rohit gets on the back foot to steer behind point
128 kph, length ball on off stump which Kohli defends off the back foot
128 kph, back of a length which Kohli hits towards mid on
126 kph, length ball again as Kohli defends this watchfully
132 kph, length ball outside off and Rohit goes for a lofted inside out drive through long off for a boundary
134 kph, length ball on middle and leg which Rohit tries to work away to the leg side
136 kph, length ball and Rohit is starting to open up as he clubs across the line for a boundary through midwicket
136 kph, back of a length which Rohit gets on top of with ease
135 kph, length ball on and around off which Rohit defends manfully
137 kph, Faulkner straying down the pads and is punished with a clip through to the fine leg boundary. Big over there for India with three boundaries from the bat of Rohit
128 kph, fuller length ball which deviates slightly away from Kohli's bat as it passes through. Lovely delivery there from McKay
126 kph, back of a length and shaping in slightly as Kohli works this away
131 kph, back of a length outside off as Rohit shoulders arms
125 kph, Rohit playing McKay quite watchfully here as he gets on the front foot to defend
129 kph, fuller length delivery as Rohit goes for the drive through extra-cover
back of a length and steered behind square for a single
90 kph, pitched on a length and Rohit steers this through third man for a couple
91 kph, same line and this time Rohit pushes through to mid off
92 kph, back of a length which Kohli rocks back to and cuts away to the square boundary for four
91 kph, pitched up on middle and leg as it hits the front pad, with Doherty going up, but really, Doherty, really?
95 kph, length ball which Kohli works away square of the on the off side
94 kph, length and width provided, and Rohit obliges by opening the face to steer this expertly through third man with a lovely, languid finish
127 kph, back of a length on middle and Kohli content to defend on the back foot to the off side
125 kph, Kohli looking to steer this through extra-cover, but instead hits it towards the leg side. Hughes, taking the return from the fielder, fumbles it, and allows the extra run
130 kph, length ball which is angled away behind point
131 kph, back of a length outside off which Rohit works away through the third man region
133 kph, back of a length and Kohli works this away with ease through the off side
124 kph, Rohit will keep strike as he once again works this delivery outside off behind point
90 kph, length ball which Rohit defends back to the bowler
92 kph, pitched up which Rohit dabs down to long on
92 kph, pitched up and Rohit steps back to direct this through the extra-cover region for a single
92 kph, back of a length as Kohli gets on the front foot to defend
91 kph, speared in on leg stump as Rohit tucks it away in front of square leg
94 kph, length ball and Kohli rocks back to essay this through the off side for one, and keep the strike
133 kph, fuller length ball which Kohli drives down to long off, with mid off making a nice dive to cut down the pace
130 kph, defended on the front foot by Kohli
125 kph, length ball which Kohli gets back to and slashes hard at through the third man region
134 kph, length ball and Rohit stands strong in defence

133 kph, back of a length and Rohit makes a feeble dab at it as he gets an outside edge, with Hughes completing a high take. Wasteful shot as Rohit was looking set for a big score. The Pune crowd stand in silence

139 kph, good change up here from Watson. Preys on Raina's weakness against the short ball as Raina is unable to keep this snorter down, almost ballooning the ball to the waiting hands of short mid on
91 kph, Kohli fetches this from outside off to steer through to long off
91 kph, pitches this wide of off stump which Raina helps himself to, steering this to long off
94 kph, Kohli able to work this away through the leg side for a single
length ball which Kohli tucks away to the leg side
Kohli works this away to long off for a single
94 kph, Raina able to steer this down to long on for one and keep the strike
he pushes forward and punches the length delivery straight to point
here comes the short ball, the batsman swivels and manages to keep it down as well, played towards deep backward square leg
short ball to Kohli as well, it rises towards his armpits and Kohli ticks it behind square off the back foot
he stays in the crease and pushes the length delivery towards cover
short of length delivery, Raina dabs it on off and thinks about a single, but the ball is not very far from the fielder
another short of length delivery, Raina shuffles across and dabs it towards midwicket to pick up a single
double bluff! It's a full delivery on the stumps, and Raina had walked across to off, he flicks it to deep square leg
bowls length around off, 148kph, Kohli defends it towards midwicket
keeps angling it at the batsman, Kohli is not able to get bat to that, but runs a leg bye nonetheless
short delivery, but Hughes dives across and saves a certain boundary as Raina gets an under edge towards the leg side
back of length again, Raina goes deep into the crease and hops while working it to deep midwicket
solid front foot defence from Kohli, he meets the ball right under his eye
he comes forward and pushes at a wide delivery, plays it straight to point. It was in the air for a while
length delivery outside, Raina gets hit on the pad first and the bat too, but it just drops short of the keeper.
he shuffles across the stumps and works the back of length delivery behind square on the leg side
fuller length outside off, the batsman comes forward and crunches it straight to point
now Kohli gets a good short delivery, he goes for the pull but it flies over the top edge
another short delivery, and Kohli was in an awkward position, luckily it flew over his left shoulder
he bowls a length delivery that Raina defends off the back foot, but MJ walks up to Raina and gives him a good proper stare
fuller delivery, but down the leg side and Raina won't mind it, he flicks it in the gap at deep backward square leg with ease
gets his line right this time, it's on the off stump and Raina is off his feet as he defends the length ball
full and veering on the leg stump again, Raina whips it to deep square leg with ease
Hughes is doing great as the back-up keeper! Kohli got a thick inside edge past his off stump and Hughes reacted brilliantly to stop that from running away
back of length on the body, 152.4 kph, Kohli nudges it to deep square leg easily
he comes forward and defends the length delivery to cover
another good delivery from Watson, on a length, heading towards off, Kohli can just defend it back
wow, another well-directed bouncer, Kohli wanted to pull that, but it gets big on him and flies past his helmet grill
length delivery on off, Kohli dabs it towards covers and calls for a quick one
he bowls a slower short delivery which Raina manages to steer to fine leg, but not before he is almost across to the off side
length delivery on off, the batsman defends it to mid-on
he has dropped a straightforward aerial drive at cover, it's Faulkner
he defends this off the front foot, to the off side
now he charges down the pitch and slaps it over the non-striker's head for a much-needed boundary
he has been lucky here! He wanted to turn the ball on the onside from outside off and got a big leading edge that bobs over to mid-on where there is no one
he wanted to walk down the pitch, but Doherty delivers this faster and Kohli has to defend it to off
flighted delivery on off, Raina pushes it back to the bowler
slower through the air, Raina dabs it towards mid-on for a single
that's a foot to the right of extra cover fielder, but he didn't have time as Kohli punches this short delivery firmly to the boundary
now he charges down, gets to the pitch of the ball and plays one of those wristy drives to the extra cover boundary
he comes forward and defends this one solidly down the pitch
pushed through this time, Kohli goes back and punches it to cover
bowls it full outside off, but Raina can only squeeze it to point
he presses forward, gets to the pitch of the ball and turns it to midwicket from outside off
he comes down the pitch, makes a little room along the way, and drives it to the left of long-on fielder
flighted delivery, but not full enough, the batsman pushes it to long on for a single
pushed through on leg stump line, Kohli calmly tucks it on the leg side for a single
pushed through again, Raina pushes it past the left of the bowler for a single to long on
short of length delivery ouside off, Raina steers it down to third man
at his pace, Kohli has all the time to place his pull wherever he likes, he plays this rather well, placing it in the gap at cow corner
fuller length, he comes forward and drives it to deep cover
short and wide outside off, swings further away
back of length and around middle and leg line, Raina shuffles across and clips it to fine leg
back of length on off, 136 kph, the batsman taps it towards point
oh that was close! The ball flies past the outside edge as Kohli tries to run it down to third man
tossed up delivery outside off, the batsman comes forward and drives it through to sweeper
he comes down the pitch and whips it to deep midwicket for a single to bring in the half-century stand between these two
ah, he comes down the pitch and is nicely to the pitch of the ball, he lifts it straight over the bowler's head, heads towards the sight screen
tossed up delivery on off, the batsman tucks it to midwicket and calls for a quick single
pushed through on the middle stump line, Kohli goes deep in the crease and pushes it to deep extra cover
flatter delivery, Raina tucks it to deep midwicket for a single
back of length on off stump, Raina defends off the back foot
he dabs this one to cover and calls for a quick single
back of length delivery on off, the batsman dabs it to point
on the pads and it's easily nudged to square leg for a single
short delivery outside off, Raina swivels it some discomfort. He gets timing behind it, but it's the shape his body is in that invites more of that stuff
he presses forward and punches the length delivery forcefully to the deep cover area
oh beautifully hit! We have seen this a few times over the last couple of years. Full delivery outside off, driven stylishly through the infield, no stopping that
now dabs the length delivery down to third man for a single
on the pads, Raina tucks it straight to short fine leg and Kohli rightly sends him back in time

length delivery on off, Raina dabs it towards third man, takes off for a single, but Maxwell at point cuts it off with a super dive and throws back in one motion, Raina had to dive back in to the crease
slower delivery on off, he waits and steers it fine on the off side for a single
length delivery on off, Kohli takes a forward step and pushes it to point
length delivery on the pads, Raina clips it softly towards deep backward square and calls for the second one early

here goes Raina! He hasn't played his favourite hoick to the leg side today, but he chooses to do it now, off a length delivery outside off and he gets a thick outside edge that flies towards third man where Doherty takes a good low catch
length delivery angled in from round the wicket, the batsman helps it behind square on the leg side
gets a short ball, and Yuvraj gets into an awkward position as he expected that to come quicker at him, finally plays it towards point

he gets lucky! The crowd finds it voice, but it was a top-edge off a short ball. It flies over deep square leg, the fielder was interested, the bowler was too, but that cleared the boundary easily. Damn these short boundaries, nothing for the bowlers in this cruel world
now he is beaten outside off with a length delivery as he tries to steer it to third man
wow, beautifully punched on the up to deep cover, just for a single though
bowls a low full toss on the pads and Yuvraj just manages to get his bat down in time, tickles it to the leg side towards square leg
short of length delivery on off, the batsman pulls it in the air towards deep midwicket for a single
he seems to be aiming for Yuvraj's toe, fires a yorker on off stump. The batsman blocks it out
here comes the short ball and it was slower one too, but it's wasted as it's wide outside off. Yuvraj sways away

and short ball does him! This was quick, short of length and reared up sharply, it was 150+ kph as well and Yuvraj gets squared up and ends up edging this one to the keeper. We have seen him getting out like that in Tests before. Hughes enjoying his day as the keeper. Super delivery that one though.
he stays on the back foot and punches it through cover for a single
pushed through on stumps, Dhoni defends it from the crease
again, pushed through a bit, but it's on the pads and Dhoni dabs it towards square leg for a single
bowls it a touch slower, Kohli defends it to off
quicker delivery, Kohli pushes it back to the bowler
he pushes this to deep cover to bring up yet another half-century. It's been a different kind of an innings, but assured nonetheless, against some really high-quality pace bowling from Australia
he angles it in, but Kohli gets an outside edge past the keeper. He was looking to steer it towards third man, but this runs down fine
length delivery on off, he plays this solidly towards mid-on
back of length delivery on off, Kohli gets on top of the bounce and defends it solidly again
length delivery outside off, Kohli punches this behind square on off side, but it's hit straight to point
he allows the ball to come with the angle and dabs it to square leg for a single
bowls a yorker outside off for Dhoni from over the wicket, the batsman digs it out
he shimmies down the pitch, but is not to the pitch of the ball, check his shot as he plays it towards cover
bowls this slower and gives it a bit of flight, Kohli plays it towards backward point off the outside half
he fires this one on the pads and Kohli misses his sweep shot
on the pads again, Kohli wanted to whack it towards midwicket, but gets an inside edge on to his pads
pushed through on off, the batsman goes back and chops it down to backward point
pushed through on off, Kohli defends it to off
fuller length delivery outside off, Dhoni steers it down to third man, more of an outside edge there
length delivery just outside off, Kohli allows it to come to him, then steers it to third man
short delivery outside off, gets big on Dhoni and he tries to pull it from outside off, gets a top-edge that drops well short of deep midwicket
fuller length delivery on off, the batsman defends it solidly
short delivery, Kohli is in a much better place to play that pull shot, keeps it down by rolling his wrists as he places it towards deep midwicket
back of length outside off, Dhoni goes deep in the crease and punches it to deep cover
pushed through on off, Dhoni goes deep in the crease and punches it firmly to long off
he comes down the pitch and looks to drive through off, but hits it straight to cover
exactly the same delivery, he comes down the pitch and this time he whips it to long on
he stays in the crease and pushes it to deep cover for a single
he comes down the pitch, but Doherty pulls the length back, so Kohli pushes it to long off for a single
tossed up delivery on the stumps, the batsman defends it towards midwicket
short delivery outside off, Kohli pulls it along the ground, but hits it straighter, to mid-on
back of length delivery on off, Kohli looks to place it past point, but can't beat the man there
short delivery outside off, he goes for the pull again and aims for the cow corner, but gets a big top-edge that drops safely in the outfield

that's the end of Kohli! Watson, after sending a few short ones, slips in a length delivery and Kohli tries to whip this to square leg across the line. He is hit on the knee roll and that would have crashed into the leg stump. The umpire didn't waste any time. That looked plumb the moment it hit the pads. Australia on top here, excellent bowling from Watson again
he defends the length delivery off the back foot to off side
short delivery, Jadeja manages to keep his pull on the ground as he places it to deep square leg
length delivery on off, Jadeja stays on the back foot and defends it to point
fuller length outside, he comes forward and defends it to short cover
well played by Jadeja has he slaps the short delivery in front of square, comes back for a couple by the time fielder from deep square leg clears it up
fuller length and wider outside off, Jadeja looks to push it to off, but it flies past his outside edge. One slip is waiting
back of length delivery outside off, Jadeja again pulls it in front of square for a single
length delivery on the pads, the batsman gets hit on the pads, but he takes a leg bye
length delivery wide of the crease, Dhoni waits in the crease and uses his wrists to power that past point for a boundary
he stays back and punches the back of length delivery to cover
short delivery, but this one has been pounded on the crease by Watson and it sails over the batsman's head
length delivery on off, Dhoni stays back and defends to off
short delivery on off, Dhoni is deep in the crease and swats it behind square on the leg side for another boundary
length delivery outside off, now Dhoni dabs it to cover for a single
back of length delivery on the stumps, Jadeja clips it straight to short fine leg
fuller delivery on off, it was asking to be driven and Dhoni did, but then he is not able to beat the man at cover
short of length delivery on off stump, Dhoni drags it to backward square leg with a horizontal bat shot
attempts a yorker, but it's a low full toss on leg stump. Jadeja whips it hard, but it's hit straight to the man at deep midwicket
length delivery on off, Dhoni drops it on the off side and scampers through for a quick single
back of length delivery on off, Jadeja goes on the back foot but gets no room, defends it back down on the pitch
teases him with a wider line and Jadeja has a tame poke at that one, is beaten outside off
bowls a slower delivery, 107 kph, and on the pads, Dhoni has to wait a lot for it, and it hits the pad as it messes with Dhoni's whip. It was heading down the leg side
another slower one, Jadeja wanted to force it to off side, but had to check his bat swing, he under edges it to the keeper
another super slower ball, Jadeja wanted to swing this one too, but it comes late and he is beaten outside off
more slower stuff, this time Jadeja squeezes it past the diving point fielder to come back for the second
slower and wider, Jadeja was expecting the pace and flashes his bat at this to power it over cover point
bowls a quick yorker on off, the batsman digs it out to mid-on
he waits in the crease and pushes it to cover point for a quick single
back of length on off, no room for Jadeja, he can only dab it towards point

super catch by the captain at mid-on! It was a quicker short delivery outside off and Jadeja is lured into the pull, but he was not in control of that shot at all, ends up hitting it towards mid-on where Bailey runs in, dives forward and takes a good catch
length delivery on off, Ashwin is in trouble as he dabs this to point and goes down for a jog, but the fielder dives and has a shy at the stumps.. The batsman had to dive back to get in
short ball again, the batsman sways out of line
short of length delivery on the body, Ashwin clips it to square leg
129 kph, Ashwin opens the face to steer this behind point for a single
130 kph, Dhoni waits on the back foot before turning this away to the leg side
Ashwin sticks his bat out to this delivery going down the pads to get a single and get Dhoni back on strike

126 kph, and that just may be the final death knell as Dhoni plays inside of a delivery shaping in and gets his off stump knocked back. The wicket all of India would have prayed to stay intact.. With 109 off 56 balls, looks like Australia's record of beating India after posting 300 or more will continue for another day
127 kph, length ball which Kumar allows through to the keeper
129 kph, Kumar takes this fuller length delivery and opens the face, which almost carries to first slip, but bounces before
speared onto leg and Ashwin clips this through midwicket
90 kph, Ashwin stretches forward to work this away down to long on
90 kph, Ashwin gropes for this one going down leg, and almost spoons a catch
Ashwin tries to work this away to the leg side but ends up inside-edging onto the pads
Doherty drifts one on the pads, clipped in front of mid-wicket for a single
fuller length and Kumar goes for the sweep, but this one was going down the leg side, so called a wide
Kumar keeps this one out successfully
131 kph, Ashwin, who really has no choice, goes for the lofted drive over cover, but ends up finding mid off instead.
130 kph, full and just outside off as Vinay defends on the front foot
back of a length as Vinay defends staunchly off the back foot
back of a length and Vinay defends again off the back foot
107 kph, slower ball which Vinay glances to the leg side for a single. Both batsman are 1 off 4. Will someone please tell them to get on with it so we can go home.
106 kph, another slower ball and Kumar tucks this through to mid on to retain the strike
136 kph, back of a length and angling in. Kumar does well to keep it out
138 kph, back of a length again as Kumar successfully gets on top of it
139 kph, fires in a short one which rises appreciably, with Kumar bending back to go for it anyways, but to no avail
139 kph, right in the blockhole as Kumar digs this out
139 kph, Kumar drives this length ball straight to silly mid off
short again from Johnson and Kumar rests on the back foot to ramp this behind point for a much-needed bonudary. But with 99 needed off 36, it's all too late
129 kph, length ball which Vinay slaps away through the off side, but finds silly mid off
back of a length which Vinay works away to the leg side
length ball from McKay, Kumar slugs it to long on for a single
slower ball from McKay, Vinay nudges it towards short fine for a single
125 kph, Kumar works this away to long on for a single
on a good length and following Vinay as he rushed forward, hits the drive in the air but falls just short of Watson at mid-off
fuller length delivery outside off and slanting across the right hander, he looks to dab it towards third man and misses
143 kph, Kumar hammers this straight to mid off for one
142 kph, Vinay goes for a loft over midwicket, but ends up getting a thick outside edge which carries behind between keeper and slip for a boundary
144 kph, Vinay misses this entirely as it deflects off his pads to the same region, only this time a single is afforded
142 kph, fuller length delivery just outside off which Kumar tries in vain to get at
141 kph, back of a length which Kumar tucks away to the leg side
84 kph, Kumar shuffles down to attempt a slog down the ground
pitched up as Vinay drives this down the ground to long off
low full toss as Kumar goes for the slog sweep to midwicket. Hughes running in but is unable to hold on to it
darted in and beats everyone as Vinay goes for a wild swing
pitched up and Kumar goes for another slog, but squirts this through square leg
Vinay advances down to this length ball to cross-bat through extra-cover
low full toss as Vinay Kumar has a flash at it, with the ball carrying to the off side
131 kph, back of a length which Kumar guides through third man
144 kph, darted on middle as Vinay goes for another swipe
143 kph, length ball going down the leg side as Vinay steps back to try and work this away through the off side
148 kph, back of a length and Vinay does well to get on top of it
142 kph, back of a length as Vinay defends staunchly on the back foot
pitched up on leg as Kumar goes for the hoick down the leg side
length ball as Vinay advances down the track, and then checks his shot to work this away to the off side
darted in on middle as Kumar heaves this through to midwicket
lovely flighted delivery which beats Vinay completely as he dances down to try and hammer this over the leg side. Australia just one wicket away from ending this
length ball and Ishant does what he does best. Blocks this out
and does the same once again. If someone could remind Ishant he is playing in colours and not whites. Even if the asking rate is hopeless..
Kumar just lofts this down to long on and goes to the other end to see Ishant bat (snigger)
what a terrible ball, and Ishant respects this as if it was a good length ball. This one lands somewhere near the median point of the wicket, and almost bounces twice before Ishant intervenes
flighted and on the stumps, Kumar defends it solidly
Kumar goes aerial, but way up in the air, and Voges comes under it at mid off to complete a testing catch.
